name: Debris Zone (V)
Lore: 'A reactor core explosion in a destroyed AT-AT causes a plasma release which shatters its armor, showering the immediate area with molten projectiles.',
Text: 'Once per turn, may take one Crash Landing or Weapon Malfunction into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR if you have a piloted AT-AT on Hoth, target artillery weapon at a related site is lost. (Immune to Sense.)',
